resources.string: Description of the app: \nThe App FloriBot HMI was build at Heilbronn University within a Bachelor thesis. With this app you can control the robot FloriBot (with a differential drive) in two axes. By moving the phone around the y-axes the robot will drive in x - direction (translation). If you move the phone around the x-axes the robot turn around z-axis.

\nThe operation system of the robot is the Robot Operating System (ROS). In general you can send and receive data on existing topics. To do so, the app creates a publisher to provide control data on a specific topic. With the created subscriber the verification data (send from the robot) were received.

Possibilities of the app: \nYou can control the robot in two operation modes. The manual and the automatic mode. In the manual mode you can decide between control with the acceleration sensor and simple joystick buttons. If you want to control the robot with joystick buttons you can adjust the current acceleration value with a slider bar. To visualize the acceleration quantity there are two progress bars. One for the translation in x - axis and the other for the steering around the z - axis. \nThese visualization are only present in manual mode with sensor control.

Connection establishment: 
1. Enter ROS Master-Address in the first field. 
2. Enter topic name of the publisher (send data to robot). 
3. Enter topic name of the subscriber (receive data from robot).

Control with acceleration sensor: 
1. Press the button for manual control mode. 
2. Press the calibration button to get custom start orientation. 
3. Confirm the initial position of your phone. 
4. Move your phone and press the dead man's push button to control the robot.

Control with joystick buttons: 
1. Press the button for manual control mode. 
2. Adjust the acceleration amount with the slider bar. 
3. Press the specific joystick button.
Automatic mode - Task 1: \n1. Press the button for automatic control mode. \n2. Press the specific button to set the first turn of the robot.
Close connection: \n1. Press the exit button to close the connection. 2. Confirm by pressing ok.
Tipp: \nThe yellow indicators on top of the control mode buttons indicates the currently active control mode.
